title: T206 Cycle 460 HOF Vic Willis with bat only 8 graded
author: hcv123

posts.post_title: T206 Cycle 460 HOF Vic Willis with bat only 8 graded
posts.post_content: While there are 8 graded copies on record combined PSA and SGC, I could find no record of a public sale since 2016!  999 or best offer by this Monday takes it home.  Price includes insured delivery.  There is a diagonal crease in the top right quadrant and a horizontal crease.  Creases notwithstanding, the card has really nice eye appeal.  I'll take it (at 999) trumps best offers.

Thank you all for your offers.  The winning offer has been notified by PM.  Happy, Healthy Holidays!

Howard
